bioconda.name: modle
bioconda.summary: High-performance stochastic modeling of DNA loop extrusion interactions

biotools.summary: MoDLE is a computational tool for fast, stochastic modeling of molecular contacts from DNA loop extrusion capable of simulating realistic contact patterns genome wide in a few minutes.

bioschemas.name: MoDLE
bioschemas.summary: MoDLE is a computational tool for fast, stochastic modeling of molecular contacts from DNA loop extrusion capable of simulating realistic contact patterns genome wide in a few minutes.
